guides.title: Safety & Education Guides
guides.description: Stay informed and safe with these essential guides.

leopard.title: Encountering a Leopard
leopard.content: Stay calm. Do not run. Make yourself look larger and back away slowly. Avoid direct eye contact.

snake.title: Snake Bite First Aid
snake.content: Keep the person calm and still. Keep the affected area below the heart. Do not apply a tourniquet or cut the wound. Seek medical help immediately.

boar.title: Protecting Crops from Wild Boars
boar.content: Use sturdy fencing. Boars are strong, so the fence should be well-maintained. Scare devices and night patrols can also be effective.

elephant.title: If you see an elephant
elephant.content: Keep a safe distance. Do not approach or feed the elephant. If it charges, run in a zig-zag pattern and try to find cover behind a large object.
